description:
Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a celestial dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est la panique ! Grosse bagarre dans la salle des ventes
Dai Panic! Auction Kaijou no Shitou
Major Panic! Desperate Struggle at the Auction House
Всеобщая паника! Хаос в аукционном доме
ذعر كبير! كفاح يائس في دار المزاد
大パニック! オークション会場の死闘
